metadata.title: CVE-2024-0582 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A memory leak flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s io_uring functionalityin how a user registers a buffer ring with IORING_REGISTER_PBUF_RING,mmap() it, and then frees it. This flaw allows a local user to crash orpotentially escalate their privileges on the system.
